items.sentence: You shouldn\'t speak to your parents that way.
Tom helps children with learning disabilities.
Tom and Mary are more or less the same weight.
I wish I hadn\'t told Tom about what happened.
Don\'t quote me on this, but I agree with you.
I can\'t believe that that\'s going to happen.
Tom is the only one who can get Mary to smile.
How did you learn Tom was living in Australia?
How did you learn how to speak French so well?
How often do you go to a hospital or a clinic?
